author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
God of War is celebrating its 20th anniversary with free in-game content, called the Dark Odyssey collection, and IRL merch (that's not free). The update will be available March 20th for PlayStation and PC, while real-life events and merch will be available starting March 15th. In other news, the Knights of the Old Republic remake at Saber Interactive is apparently still alive and kicking, despite the devs not having shown anything from the game outside of the announcement teaser three years ago. We'll believe it when we see it, Saber. And finally, Pokémon Legends: Z-A has been rated E10+, a technically more mature rating than the usual E for Everyone rating Pokémon games usually get. What does that mean for content? More swearing? Excessive violence? Who knows!
title: God of War Gets Free DLC, New Merch and More For 20th Anniversary - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: The Egghead arc of the anime series "ONE PIECE" will resume on April 6 preceded by a drop of new dubbed episodes and specials on March 18. In advance of the simulcast’s return, Toei Animation will release Specials 14, 15, 16, and a new block of Egghead Arc episodes from the series’ popular English dub.  English dub episodes 1109-1122 will be available for streaming starting March 18, 2025 on Crunchyroll in these same territories.
title: One Piece Egghead Part 2 - Official Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
The Mix teams up with the Kinda Funny gang to present some of the best indies around. Join us for The Mix + Kinda Funny Spring Showcase this Monday (3/17) at 9am PT to find your next favorite game!

#IGN #Gaming
title: The MIX + Kinda Funny Spring Game Showcase

author: IGN
description: Check out gameplay and the creepy world of Baptiste in this trailer for the upcoming psychological horror game. Baptiste is a psychological horror descent into madness, where a family’s desperate attempt to rebuild their lives in a remote UK location unravels into an unspeakable terror. Their new home does not offer refuge, it is a trap. Shadows whisper, nightmares manifest, and an ancient evil stirs, waiting to be unleashed. Baptiste will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X in 2025.
title: Baptiste - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this episode of Let's Play Lounge, Big E stops by the IGN episodes to play WWE 2K25 and explore the new game mode, the Island. 

Big E shares behind-the-scenes stories, discusses his favorite WWE moments, and takes on the latest in-game challenges, from Hell in a Cell to Roman Regin's Challenges.
We explore all four unique districts, packed with WWE Easter eggs and new legendary arenas. As we play Big E opens up about his greatest rivals, his signature moves like the Big Ending and the Spear through the ropes, and his favorite WWE Entrance music.
WWE 2K25 is available on Playstation, Xbox and PC, with The Island available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S


Check out our other WWE 2K25 content, like where we sit down with WWE 2K25 developers to discuss the new Underground match, Roman Reigns' reaction to the game, and LA Knight’s entrance breakdown.


“The Island is a brand new online open world that pays tribute to WWE Legends, Superstars, and the Original Tribal Chief, Roman Rei
title: Big E's Most Painful Moves in WWE, Origin of His Finisher, and Exploring “The Island” on WWE 2K25

author: IGN
description:
This summer is about to get Freakier. Check out the Freakier Friday trailer (Freaky Friday 2) for this upcoming movie starring Jamie Lee Curtis and Lindsay Lohan. The film will be released exclusively in theaters August 8, 2025.

In the film, Curtis and Lohan reprise their roles as Tess and Anna Coleman. The story picks up years after Tess (Curtis) and Anna (Lohan) endured an identity crisis. Anna now has a daughter of her own and a soon-to-be stepdaughter. As they navigate the myriad challenges that come when two families merge, Tess and Anna discover that lightning might indeed strike twice. 

Freakier Friday is directed by Nisha Ganatra and based on the book “Freaky Friday” by Mary Rodgers. The film, which also stars Julia Butters, Sophia Hammons, Manny Jacinto, Maitreyi Ramakrishnan, Rosalind Chao, Chad Michael Murray, Vanessa Bayer, and Mark Harmon, is produced by Kristin Burr, p.g.a., Andrew Gunn, p.g.a., and Jamie Lee Curtis, with Nathan Kelly, Ann Marie Sanderlin, and Lindsay
title: Freakier Friday - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Jamie Lee Curtis, Lindsay Lohan

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Fortnite Party Up - Spring Raid trailer to see what to expect with this raid event, where you explore Fortnite experiences with friends and earn Locker items. The Fortnite Party Up - Spring Raid runs today, March 14, and ends March 31 at 6 AM PT/ 9 AM ET. 

Every day until March 22, a new Party Up - Spring Raid Quest will unlock for you and your party to complete. The more Party Up - Spring Raid Quests you complete, the more rewards you and your party will unlock in Fortnite. These rewards also include matching accessories for Invincible's Dupli-Kate.

#Fortnite #Gaming #IGN
title: Fortnite: Party Up Spring Raid - Official Dupli-Kate Outfit Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Your Friends & Neighbors trailer for the upcoming Apple TV+ drama series starring Jon Hamm, Amanda Peet, Olivia Munn, Hoon Lee, Mark Tallman, Lena Hall, Aimee Carrero, Eunice Bae, Isabel Gravitt and Donovan Colan.

After being fired in disgrace, Andrew “Coop” Cooper (Hamm), a hedge fund manager still grappling with his recent divorce, resorts to stealing from the homes of his neighbors in the exceedingly affluent Westmont Village, only to discover that the secrets and affairs hidden behind those wealthy facades might be more dangerous than he ever imagined.

From creator Jonathan Tropper and executive produced by Jon Hamm, Your Friends & Neighbors premieres its first two episodes globally on Apple TV+ on April 11, 2025.

#AppleTV #TV #Trailer
title: Your Friends & Neighbors - Official Trailer (2025) Jon Hamm

author: IGN
description: Skyward Entertainment's platformer/action-RPG Second Stone: The Legend of the Hidden World is ready to show off some of the story behind its fantasy world. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3557360/Second_Stone_The_Legend_of_the_Hidden_World/
title: Second Stone: The Legend of the Hidden World – Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description: This week on Podcast Unlocked, Ash Parrish joins host Michael Higham and Miranda Sanchez and discuss all the things that make South of Midnight a special release from Compulsion Games, from the gameplay, to beautiful visuals, to incredibly accurate and heartwarming cultural references that bring together the heart of the game's narrative.
title: How South of Midnight's Cultural Inspiration Makes It Special - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description:
Watch our Commandos: Origins preview along with some brand new Commandos: Origins gameplay to find out what we think of the upcoming real-time tactics game. So far, Commandos: Origins is offering a compelling case for its comeback, which can potentially put the series back on the map as an exciting and satisfying tactics game. Previewed by Alessandro Fillari.

The Commandos sequel, Commandos: Origins, will be released on April 9, 2025.

#Gaming #CommandosOrigins #Games
title: Commandos: Origins Revives the Challenge – and Satisfaction – of Stealth Tactics Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week, Daemon is joined by Unlocked's Ryan McCaffrey—in person!—and IGN's executive tech editor, Bo Moore, to talk about Xbox's supposed leaked next-gen plans. Microsoft has reportedly greenlit a brand new next-gen Xbox console and not one but two handhelds, one of which will be made by a third party. Plus we have last week's poll results and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Next-Gen Xbox: Windows Into the Future - Next-Gen Console Watch

author: IGN
description:
Watch the new Death Stranding 2: On the Beach trailer for a look at what's included in the Collector's Edition of the upcoming action-adventure game from Hideo Kojima. The Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Collector's Edition comes with a collector's box and includes a voucher code to redeem the digital version of the game, a 15" Magellan Man statue, a 3" Dollman figurine, a letter from Hideo Kojima, art cards, and a selection of in-game items. It's available to pre-order from March 17, 10am local time.

Embark on an inspiring mission of human connection beyond the UCA. Sam—with companions by his side—sets out on a new journey to save humanity from extinction. Join them as they traverse a world beset by otherworldly enemies, obstacles and a haunting question: should we have connected?

The Death Stranding 2: On the Beach release date is June 26, 2025 for PS5 (PlayStation 5). Players who purchase the Collector's Edition can play from June 24 with Early Access.

#DeathStranding2 #DeathSt
title: Death Stranding 2: On the Beach Collector's Edition - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Midnight Murder Club is available now in Early Access for PlayStation 5 and PC, featuring crossplay and cross-progression support for players on both platforms. Learn more about Midnight Murder Club in this trailer for this hide, seek, and shoot party game from Velan Studios. 

In Midnight Murder Club, up to six friends can hunt each other in the pitch-black rooms of the mysterious Wormwood Manor. Armed with only a revolver and a flashlight, they will search the shadows for every flicker of light and every bump in the night as they stalk their prey. The tension turns to hilarity as friends, and foes, discover just how tricky it is to navigate and shoot in complete darkness.
title: Midnight Murder Club - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Ultimate ninja power! Equal parts speed and stealth, Ninja Espio knows how to slip past his rivals for the win. Meet Ninja Espio in this latest Sonic Forces: Speed Battle trailer for the racing game. Ninja Espio is available in Sonic Forces: Speed Battle, and coming soon to Sonic Dash.
title: Sonic Forces: Speed Battle - Official Ninja Espio Trailer
